name: freiheit.com
text:
freiheit.com technologies gmbh specializes in building software for the digital future.

The software company was founded in Hamburg in 1999. As an Internet pioneer in Germany the company has been developing new ideas and software systems for digital business models ever since. 70 full-stack engineers are currently working at freiheit.com.

The privately-held company is known for their innovative approach, technical expertise, conceptual skills, and reliability. Engineering made in Germany.
